nodes.text: Gil Burtin was a male Mon Calamari privateer.
In 1 ABY, Gil resided in the Bestine hotel on Tatooine. While here, he would periodically process papers for pilots who wished to resign from their freelance piloting.

Gil Burtin is a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the
MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. In the game, players can talk to him to resign from their respective freelance squadron.
